notesStmt.note: An essay in Judeo-Arabic, in this folio the subject is the fear and love of God, using biblical definitions and examples, and citing the Talmudic source on this issue, Sotah 31a. The author refers to David as אלסיד דוד, and to Moses as אלסיד אלרסול. The type of erasures, corrections and interlinear addenda indicate that this may be an autograph(?) draft.
